title: Nasscom announces cohort of 37 GenAI startups for its foundry programme
description: On average, startups in the cohort are two years old and have already raised $750,000 from institutional investors, Nasscom said.
content: Technology industry association Nasscom on Thursday announced the selection of 37 Generative AI startups for the second cohort of its Generative AI Foundry programme.
cleaned_content: technology industry association nasscom on thursday announced the selection of <THREE_TEN> generative ai startups for the second cohort of its generative ai foundry programme
